title: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta. Cook tomatoes with garlic and olive oil. Mix and serve.

title: Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana with milk and honey. Serve chilled.

title: Potato Curry
instructions: Boil potatoes. Fry onions with turmeric and spices. Mix and cook well.

title: Kerala Fish Curry
instructions: Cook fish in coconut milk with spices and tamarind. Simmer until cooked.

title: Appam with Stew
instructions: Ferment rice flour. Make appam. Cook vegetables in coconut milk for stew.

title: Puttu and Kadala Curry
instructions: Steam rice flour and coconut to make puttu. Cook chickpeas in spicy gravy.

title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Make dosa batter. Prepare potato masala. Fill dosa with masala and serve.

title: Avial
instructions: Cook mixed vegetables. Add coconut paste and curd. Mix with curry leaves.

title: Egg Roast
instructions: Boil eggs. Roast onion, tomato, and spices. Add eggs and cook in masala.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken. Cook with spices. Layer with rice and cook on low flame.

title: Parippu Curry
instructions: Cook dal. Add coconut paste. Temper with spices and serve hot.

title: Sambar
instructions: Cook dal and vegetables. Add tamarind and spices. Temper and serve with rice.
